input: Create an art spec for the Void Reaver enemy — a corrupted humanoid that phases in and out of existence. It should be unsettling but not gory, fitting our T-rated aesthetic.
expected_behavior: Produces a character art spec with silhouette description, color palette, key visual features, animation requirements (phase-in/out effect), polygon budget, texture requirements, and approval criteria.

input: Spec the Crystalline Caverns environment — a bioluminescent underground area with towering crystal formations and underground rivers.
expected_behavior: Produces an environment spec with key landmarks, lighting direction, material properties (crystal refraction, water), modular pieces needed, geometry budget, and reference images description.
rubric: Modular piece list for environment building

description: Create an audio specification for a game area
input: Create audio specs for the Starfall Ruins zone. Include ambient soundscape, combat music triggers, and interactive SFX for the ancient alien mechanisms the player activates.
expected_behavior: Produces an audio spec with ambient layers, music cues with transition rules, SFX list with emotional intent, technical format requirements, and adaptive audio behavior.
rubric: SFX list with emotional intent per sound
Technical format specified (sample rate, format, length)
